synopsis.text:
Express ing the thrill of cosmic adventures, Doraemon and his companions embark on a journey aboard the enigmatic Galactic Express, a space-bound train with a clandestine destination. Unbeknownst to them, the galaxy faces a dire threat from marauding thieves intent on seizing control. United in their resolve, our heroes rise to the challenge, determined to thwart the invaders and safeguard the cosmos.

Simultaneously, the group finds themselves on a space-themed Mystery Train, headed for an interstellar amusement park. However, their excitement is overshadowed by the emergence of a hostile alien virus seeking to claim their bodies as hosts.

The journey begins when Doraemon inexplicably disappears for three days, only to reveal his secret mission to the 22nd century. His objective: to secure a coveted ticket for the mystical Galactic Express, a train whose destination remains a well-kept secret until its passengers arrive.  Prepare for a captivating odyssey filled with intrigue, camaraderie, and courage as Doraemon and his friends confront the challenges that await them in the vast expanse of space.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
